gist.headline: Pruning the notice board
gist.blurb: Doing a little housekeeping on the documentation to keep things fresh and accurate.
gist.summary: Removed references to Google Summer of Code 2026 from the main README and specific app documentation.
gist.impact: Ensures the documentation remains accurate and focused on current opportunities.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee tidying up a wooden community notice board in a garden, taking down an old pixelated flyer. The Nomnom creature is nearby, happily eating the removed paper.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot removing an old paper flyer from a wooden garden notice board. The round tan nomnom creature waits below with mouth open to eat the paper. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft peach gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm, helpful vibes.
